      • CityMap

        public CityMap(java.lang.Iterable<Intersection> intersections,
               java.lang.Iterable<StreetSection> streetSections)
        Create a city map which contain the given intersections and street sections.
        Parameters:
        intersections - The intersections contained in the new city map.
        streetSections - The street sections contained in the city map.

    • Method Detail

      • shortestPath

        public Route shortestPath(AbstractWaypoint startWaypoint,
                          AbstractWaypoint endWaypoint)
        Find the shortest path between the start and the end way points given as parameters.
        Parameters:
        startWaypoint - Start point from which the shortest path begin.
        endWaypoint - End point on which the shortest path end.
        Returns:
        A Route instance which contains a list of street sections which corresponds to the shortest path between the start and the end point given as parameters.

      • shortestPath

        @Requires(value={"startWaypoint != null","endWaypoints != null","intersections.containsValue(startWaypoint.getIntersection())"})
protected java.util.List<Route> shortestPath(AbstractWaypoint startWaypoint,
                                                                                                                                                                              java.util.List<AbstractWaypoint> endWaypoints)
        Find the shortest paths between the start way point and each end way points given as parameters.
        Parameters:
        startWaypoint - The start point from which the shortest paths begin.
        endWaypoints - The end points on which the shortest paths end. return A list of Route each composed of a list of street sections which correspond to the shortests path between the start and each end points given as parameters.

        @Requires(value={"request != null","request.getWarehouse() != null","request.getDeliveryAddresses() != null"})
public DeliveryGraph computeDeliveryGraph(DeliveryRequest request)
        Compute a delivery graph by using a delivery request.
        Parameters:
        request - The delivery request for which the delivery graph has to be computed.
        Returns:
        A delivery graph which contains the way points contained in the given delivery request.

      • isIntersectionInCityMap

        public boolean isIntersectionInCityMap(int idIntersection)
        Check if the city map contains an intersection with the given id.
        Parameters:
        idIntersection - The id of the intersection to search among the intersections of the city map.
        Returns:
        True if the city map contains an intersection with the given id, false otherwise.
